President Laura Roslin.Action: Grips Baltar's arm and hand, praises his work sincerely and acknowledges his contribution to the armistice conference.
Attempts to reassure Commander Adama by expressing hope in the Cylon armistice and peace efforts.
Acknowledges Baltar's role in securing the armistice and praises his work, showing political awareness and diplomatic tact.
Expresses optimism about the armistice despite Commander Adama's warnings, potentially underestimating the threat posed by the Cylons.
Insists upon restraint in launching intercept fighters despite uncertainty about the threat.
Insists on restraint and not launching fighters until the situation is clearer, despite the urgency of the attack.

Insists on restraint and forbids launching fighters until the situation is clearer despite an ongoing attack.
